task.name: Deploy StackDock's Internal Beacon Network (Infrastructure Setup)

description: Deploy small 'hello world' demo apps/servers on each major provider with health check endpoints. These become StackDock's 'canary deployments' for monitoring.

acceptanceCriteria: Demo app deployed (EC2 or Lambda with API Gateway)
Endpoint returns 200 OK with minimal latency
subtasks.deploymentType: EC2 or Lambda with API Gateway

subtasks.description: Store demo app URLs in Convex configuration table

acceptanceCriteria: Demo apps deployed on AWS, Vercel, Cloudflare, and DigitalOcean
All apps expose health check endpoints
URLs stored in Convex beacon_endpoints table
Apps serve as 'canary deployments' for monitoring
implementationNotes: Keep demo apps minimal - just enough to verify DNS and server availability
Health endpoints should be lightweight and fast
Use consistent endpoint path (/health or /api/beacon) across all providers
Document all URLs for Cloudflare Worker configuration
